K10D0228_H0229:362b-5: bcur byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste /
K10D0228_H0229:362b-6: de dag da ltar bzhugs so //
K10D0228_H0229:362b-8: dpag tu med pa de dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K10D0228_H0229:362b-9: tshig de gsungs ma thag tu de nas stong gsum
K10D0228_H0229:362b-10: gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa
K10D0228_H0229:362b-12: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe kun tu
K10D0228_H0229:362b-13: 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der byang chub sems
K10D0228_H0229:362b-14: dpa' khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mi skye
K10D0228_H0229:362b-15: ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10D0228_H0229:362b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang sems can bsam pa
K10D0228_H0229:362b-17: yongs su dag pa rnams kyi rna ba'i dbang po
K10D0228_H0229:362b-18: la chos kyi rnam grangs grags par gyur to //
K10D0228_H0229:362b-19: byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang ma lhag ma chad par kun bzung ngo //
K10D0228_H0229:362b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang chos kyi rnam grangs
K10D0228_H0229:362b-21: 'di thos nas srog chags bye ba drug cu rtsa
K10D0228_H0229:362b-22: bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0228_H0229:362b-23: byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K10D0228_H0229:362b-24: byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cus ni /
K10D0228_H0229:362b-25: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo //
K10D0228_H0229:362b-26: dge slong stong phrag bcu bzhis ni /
K10D0228_H0229:362b-27: zag pa las ma lus par sems rnams par grol lo //
K10D0228_H0229:362b-28: dge slong ma lnga stong dang /
K10D0228_H0229:362b-30: mi'i skye rgu sems can khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug ni /
K10D0228_H0229:363a-0: chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma @363a *//
K10D0228_H0229:363a-1: dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K10D0228_H0229:363a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de bzhin
K10D0228_H0229:363a-3: gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka'
K10D0228_H0229:363a-5: khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di longs shig /
K10D0228_H0229:363a-6: gzhan la'ang rgya cher shod cig /
K10D0228_H0229:363a-9: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags so //
K10D0228_H0229:363a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0228_H0229:363a-12: ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i tshe spyod par 'gyur bar khyod la gtad do //
K10D0228_H0229:363a-14: gal te byang chub sems dpa' da ltar phyogs bcu'i
K10D0228_H0229:363a-15: 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
K10D0228_H0229:363a-16: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa /
K10D0228_H0229:363a-18: gzhes pa ji snyed pa dang /
K10D0228_H0229:363a-19: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na spyad pa spyod pa dang /
K10D0228_H0229:363a-21: yongs su brtag pa bzung na; sems can thams cad
K10D0228_H0229:363a-22: kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0228_H0229:363a-23: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing stobs
K10D0228_H0229:363a-25: gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las
K10D0228_H0229:363a-26: 'das pa de dag kyang yongs su brtag pa bzung
K10D0228_H0229:363a-28: rang sangs rgyas dang bcas te slar zhugs par gyur la /
K10D0228_H0229:363a-29: de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la
K10D0228_H0229:363a-30: phyi ma'i mthar thug gi bar du bde ba'i yo
K10D0228_H0229:363a-31: byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas /
K10D0228_H0229:363a-34: mchod pa byas shing yongs su mya ngan las 'das
K10D0228_H0229:363a-35: nas kyang yun de srid du mchod pa byas na
K10D0228_H0229:363b-0: byang chub sems dpa' @363b bsod nams mang du 'phel
K10D0228_H0229:363b-1: bar 'gyur ram / ma pham par gsol pa /
K10D0228_H0229:363b-3: bdag gi dpe 'di thos nas sems kyang rmongs par 'gyur te /
K10D0228_H0229:363b-4: de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K10D0228_H0229:363b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0228_H0229:363b-7: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len par byed /
K10D0228_H0229:363b-10: kun chub par byed; gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston par byed cing /
K10D0228_H0229:363b-11: chung du na thos nas mos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
K10D0228_H0229:363b-12: de bas kyang shin tu bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0228_H0229:363b-14: nga da mya las 'das nas gang bud med la
K10D0228_H0229:363b-15: la zhig gis sring mo the tshom sel ba de'am
K10D0228_H0229:363b-16: / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de'am /
K10D0228_H0229:363b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i de mtshan thos sam /
K10D0228_H0229:363b-18: chung du na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na /
K10D0228_H0229:363b-19: de nyid de'i lus tha mar gyur te /
K10D0228_H0229:363b-20: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0228_H0229:363b-21: chub tu'ang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
K10D0228_H0229:363b-22: bar 'gyur ro // tshe 'das nas kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0228_H0229:363b-23: mi khom pa brgyad kyang yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0228_H0229:363b-24: tshe rabs kyang dran par 'gyur ro //
K10D0228_H0229:363b-26: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0228_H0229:363b-27: gzhan yang mngal du mi gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0228_H0229:364a-2: bud med gang dag bdag cag gi ming thos pa
K10D0228_H0229:364a-3: de yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par gyur cig
K10D0228_H0229:364a-4: ces smon lam 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0228_H0229:364a-5: bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0228_H0229:364a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang /
K10D0228_H0229:364a-10: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o //
K10D0228_H0229:364a-11: sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0228_H0229:364a-12: lo ts'a ba bandhe dpal dbyangs dang /
